item.description:
Here are the details to the Provincetown bike ride. The fast ferry leaves Boston 9a.m. and and you pick your return either 4pm or 8:30pm, which ever is convenient to you. I will probably take the 8:30pm because I love watching sunsets on a ferry.

Schedule for ferry:
June 11 – September 3

Monday – Wednesday

Departs Boston – 9:00 AM & 2:00 PM
Departs P-Town – 11:00 AM & 4:00 PM

Thursday – Sunday

Departs Boston – 9:00 AM, 2:00 PM & 6:30 PM
Departs P-Town – 11:00 AM, 4:00 PM & 8:30 PM

UNLESS ppl want to depart Boston at 2pm and do a dinner instead of a lunch and all depart 8:30pm.

Bikes are $6 each way. R/T tickets for a person is $83. Use your best judgement on when you wanna purchase your tickets cause we never know if there is rain and this doesn't happen.
http://www.bostonharborcruises.com/provincetown-ferry/
617.227.4321

MBTA info
Take the MBTA Blue Line to Aquarium Station. BHC is located right beside the east end of the station (Follow the exit signs for the Aquarium). For full info, please visit www.mbta.com.
**You may take your bike on the T on weekends all day at any time (except for Green Line).

** Please leave comments or suggestions on this page instead of email directly because I want everyone on the same page and no mixed messages.

** Bring helmet, water and a snack
item.name: P-town Bike Day
